excerpt: Want to start the new year off with a great fitness tracker to help motivate your workouts and track your health stats and vitals? Then don’t miss this great deal on the all new Apple Watch S…
text: Want to start the new year off with a great fitness tracker to help motivate your workouts and track your health stats and vitals? Then don’t miss this great deal on the all new Apple Watch Series 10 is available for just $329 in select color and band options, available right now on Amazon. Maybe you wanted an Apple Watch for Christmas and didn’t get one, or maybe you just want to treat yourself or a loved one, whatever the reason, why pay full price from Apple when Amazon is offering an 18% discount for the same product? Apple Watch Series 10 offers a 42mm always-on display, excellent fitness and activity tracking features, heart rate monitor, ECG capability, crash detection, fall detection with SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, one handed pinch gesture support, water resistance, voice control, and so much more. Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (explore the various color options and band options colors at $329 down from $399 MSRP) You might find that certain band and color options ship sooner than others, so check out the various options that are available at the great discounted price, and make your shopping decision depending on your urgency. If you’re new to Apple Watch, you might appreciate some of these useful tips to get the most out of the device, and don’t miss browsing through our Apple Watch archives either. Start the new year off right with an excellent fitness tracker, and you can even get three months of Fitness+ for free to further motivate your fitness and health journey. FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
html:
Want to start the new year off with a great fitness tracker to help motivate your workouts and track your health stats and vitals? Then don’t miss this great deal on the all new Apple Watch Series 10 is available for just $329 in select color and band options, available right now on Amazon.

Maybe you wanted an Apple Watch for Christmas and didn’t get one, or maybe you just want to treat yourself or a loved one, whatever the reason, why pay full price from Apple when Amazon is offering an 18% discount for the same product?

Apple Watch Series 10 offers a 42mm always-on display, excellent fitness and activity tracking features, heart rate monitor, ECG capability, crash detection, fall detection with SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, one handed pinch gesture support, water resistance, voice control, and so much more.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (explore the various color options and band options colors at $329 down from $399 MSRP)

You might find that certain band and color options ship sooner than others, so check out the various options that are available at the great discounted price, and make your shopping decision depending on your urgency.

If you’re new to Apple Watch, you might appreciate some of these useful tips to get the most out of the device, and don’t miss browsing through our Apple Watch archives either.

Start the new year off right with an excellent fitness tracker, and you can even get three months of Fitness+ for free to further motivate your fitness and health journey.

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
